tests.title: Convos/faculty_path.convo.txt/faculty-L1
tests.context:
{
  "title": "Conversation Log",
  "value": "#me: Faculty and qualifications
#bot: The faculty strength of the department is 31,
 which includes
3 Professors
7 Associate Professors
21 Assistant Professors. 
Nine of the faculty have completed their PhDs in IITs and reputed universities in the area of Speech Processing, Image processing, Networking, Communication & Microelectronics.
 Seven faculty members are pursuing their PhDs at IISc, IITs and other reputed institutions.
 For more Information:https://sit.irins.org/faculty/index/Electronics+and+Communication+Engineering
#bot: Thank you"
}
